Title: Yozakura Quartet: Tsuki ni Naku
Description:
['"Tsuki ni Naku" will take the story content from volume 11 of the manga, which features a visit to a onsen by the members of the Hiizumi Life Councelling Office, while the town's police force have to deal with a new youkai-hunter threat.', '
', '
', '
', '
This OVA is bundled with the limited edition of the manga (14th, 15th, and 16th).']
Characters: ['Kishi, Kyousuke', 'Mizuki, Shidou', 'Nanami, Ao', 'Yarizakura, Hime', 'Isone, Kotoha', 'Hiizumi, Akina', 'F, V Lila', 'Shinatsuhiko, Yae', 'F, V Juli', 'Shinatsuhiko, Yuuhi']
Voices: ['Ono, Daisuke', 'Kase, Yasuyuki', 'Fujita, Saki', 'Fukuen, Misato', 'Sawashiro, Miyuki', 'Kaji, Yuki', 'Kayano, Ai', 'Kuwatani, Natsuko', 'Ookubo, Aiko', 'Matsumoto, Sachi']
Staff: [['Nakamura, Shinichi', 'Producer'], ['ryo-timo', 'Director, Episode Director, Storyboard, Character Design, Animation Director'], ['Kobayashi, Hiroshi', 'Episode Director, Storyboard'], ['Yoshizaki, Hibiki', 'Episode Director, Storyboard']]
